mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Kelley, Benjamin Franklin
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov. Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 22 1862. By Telegraph from New Creek 22 1862. I have no ammunition suitable for Carlin's Guns Maulsley's is also short of ammunition if it cannot be had any other way major constable must go in person at once for it BF Kelley Brig Genl32z106pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Kelley, Benjamin Franklin
New Creek, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
